/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a bustling street scene in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a low angle, looking upwards towards the towering buildings that line the street. These structures are predominantly white and gray, punctuated by occasional brown and red accents, reflecting the urban architectural style of the city. The sky above is a clear blue, providing a stark contrast to the man-made landscape below. The street itself is a hive of activity, with cars and pedestrians adding life to the scene. The image is bathed in the warm glow of a sunny day, casting long shadows and highlighting the architectural details of the buildings.
